title: Is it possible for me to get my IP refunded?
body:
I foolishly bought Brand with IP and then unlocked a Mystery skin with him. I can no longer refund him and get back my IP.

If I was to put RP on my account, could the cost Brand be taken from that and i be refunded the 4,800IP? I need runes.

replies.body:
I think each account has a chance to refund any purchase 3x.
I dont remember where, but it should be around the shop section, perhaps purchase history.

Hope this helps

He unlocked a mystery skin for brand and mystery skins can't not be refunded. I suggest to you talk to player support than the Boards to get it fixed, you may gain back the ip but may lose the rp you bought from mystery gifting
